testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin) I want to be able to access the entire regular pickup list via API connection.
testcase.name: Invalid Token When a GET request is sent to the api/pickuprequest/regular endpoint with invalid authorization information, it should be verified that the status code returned is 401 and the message information in the response body is "Unauthenticated.".

failure.message: expected:<status code: 401, reason phrase: Unauthorized> but was:<null>

testcase.failure:
* The api user sets "api/pickuprequest/regular" path parameters.............passed * The api user sends a "GET" request, saves the returned response, and verifies that the status code is '401' with the reason phrase Unauthorized..failed
